summary: This bill, the Department of Defense PFAS Discharge Prevention Act, mandates the Secretary of Defense to request modifications to stormwater discharge permits for Department of Defense facilities. These modifications require quarterly monitoring of perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) discharges and the implementation of best management practices to reduce them. Additionally, the bill allocates at least 1% of funds for PFAS remediation efforts to stormwater runoff testing.
